name: Shadow Shuffle
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam #211 - Insane Accuracy

Start the game by  hovering your mouse over the rainbow square! 

Made live on stream, it was a fun experience and I'm decently happy with the end product. I was limited on assets but squares are cool so I am not bothered. A stopwatch is built-in to make the game speedrunner-friendly.

Interpretation of the Theme: move mouse good and you  do not die lol

Special Thanks: lauclan_dev, Treycen, and Cpt_Fubar.
